column5: This ruined medieval castle on the coast of Northern Ireland looks like it’s about to topple off the edge ofthe steep cliffs it’s perched upon.Legend says that the kitchen itself fell into a the sea on a stormy night, and while that’s not actually true (the kitchen is still intact) its romantic aura and silhouette have inspired artists from C.S. Lewis to Led Zeppelin.
column6: The ruins of this medieval castle in Northern Ireland have inspired artists from C.S. Lewis to Led Zeppelin.
